snippet: Nelson Mandela has become an exaggerated template for South Africans' hopes and fears.
abstract: Nelson Mandela has become an exaggerated template for South Africans' hopes and fears.
lead_paragraph: JOHANNESBURG - Last Friday, the holiday cheer of New Year celebrations was disrupted by news that Nelson Mandela had just been rushed to the hospital. A popular local D.J., Kaya FM's Bob Mabena, saw a report on a local television news channel and tweeted about it, setting off a virtual panic.
